Plot: A group of assassins come together for a suicide mission to kill an evil lord.
Title: 13 Assassins
Writer: Kaneo Ikegami (based on a screenplay by), Daisuke Tengan (screenplay)
Actors: Kôji Yakusho, Takayuki Yamada, Yûsuke Iseya, Ikki Sawamura
tomatoConsensus: Takashi Miike's electric remake of Eiichi Kudo's 1963 period action film is a wild spectacle executed with killer, dizzying panache.
